notes: Found comprehensive component system: 52 components including buttons (13 types), icons (20+ types), logos (3 variations)
Style system includes: 46 colors/gradients, 8 shadow levels, multiple button variants
Common patterns: Logo + Navigation + CTAs, Hero sections with text + illustrations
Created ground truth manifest with all 98 headers mapped to routes
Built React app with Vite + Tailwind v4, created reusable component library
Implemented 3 header templates (Hero, Minimal, Centered) supporting all 98+ variations
Live preview deployed to Modal sandbox
